forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 18C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 64F. S winds shifting to W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 51F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 17C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 64F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 60F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 59F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 19C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 67F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 11C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 53F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 18C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 66F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 65F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 11C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 52F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 19C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 67F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 55F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.
